body:
Hello guys! Iv'e been having some issues lately while playing on the wonderful walls server! Here's how my problem goes down: My friends and I were sky basing and we were pretty determined to win. having full iron, we felt pretty stacked. Then all of a sudden I get knocked off! The walls didn't even drop! Is this against the rules? I'm quite discouraged, this has happened about 2 more times after this incident. Please can we make this a rule?

- thank you, hope this concerns some of u avid walls players :D

p.s: is this the right category??

title: Walls pre-game kills!

replies.body:
How were you knocked off? Some mystic power? :c

Also there's been a lot of bugs lately since yesterday's update, so just be patient and Ivy will fix it! <3
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body: If you were shot off, that already isn't allowed. ^-^
replies.body_tagged: If you were shot off, that already isn't allowed. ^-^

replies.body: Ok here is what you do, say you are recording this wall match.  So if someone is attempting to pull a fast one, you have it "on tape".  Or you could really record the match just in case.  HOMIE OUT!
replies.body_tagged: Ok here is what you do, say you are recording this wall match.  So if someone is attempting to pull a fast one, you have it "on tape".  Or you could really record the match just in case.  HOMIE OUT!

replies.body: Oh sorry Midnightbeats! I was shot off by arrows! Of course some guy was using magical powers and threw me off my base!

replies.body: <3 Roman Thanks i'll report next time it happens!
